entities.description: The count of occurrences of each response category without any adjustment.
The label representing each unique response to survey questions.
Data points that were not provided or left unanswered by participants.
The total number of survey responses collected for that particular item.
Statistical measures such as mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
The type of data collected; in this case, it is numeric.
The number of valid responses excluding any missing data.

relationships.description: Associates each response category with its respective count.
Indicates the count or proportion of missing data in the survey.
Reflects the total number of responses for the survey item.
Links the survey results to their respective statistical measures.
Defines the type of variable for the survey item.
Indicates the number of valid responses excluding any missing data.
